name: Chronicles of the Chaosborn
description:
Overview: 

Your in quite the tight spot with your family... So it's time to pick up the pieces and take care of them! Build your own village, build your own harem and uncover your
mysterious past. Learn who you are and where you come from. Follow the MC's story as he takes on anyone who crosses his path and steal all the girls heart along the way!

Release Date: 2021-03-25
Developer: Chaosborn Patreon Discord
Censored: No
Version: 0.1
OS: Windows
Language: English

Installation: 1. Extract and run.

Estimated playtime: 1-2 hours

Dev notes: First release!
